channel.title: My Newletter code (I need help please)
channel.description:
Download the attachment below...
The adding email part works but the sending email part does not... i want it so it sends all round emails to those who have signed up... If you can fix, please tell me what i need to do. Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 10 March 2008, 13:52:38[/size][hr]C'mon i really need help as i am still learning php.
